slide1.title: Welcome to Tarot
slide1.description: Shuffle, draw and uncover insights with immersive tarot spreads.

slide2.title: Choose Powerful Spreads
slide2.description: From single-card reflections to complex crosses, pick layouts for any intention.

slide3.title: Capture Interpretations
slide3.description: Save readings, jot personal notes, and share mystical snapshots with friends.

disclaimer.title: Before You Begin
disclaimer.description1: Tarot offers guidance and reflection. It does not replace professional advice in legal, medical, financial or psychological matters.
disclaimer.description2: Use every reading with mindfulness and responsibility for your decisions.
disclaimer.rememberDescription: Treat each spread as inspiration. Listen to your intuition and personal wisdom first.

hero.title: Draw a card for your path today
hero.subtitle: Tap into symbolism, rituals and guided reflections whenever you need clarity.

education.title: Explore the deck
education.body: Study each card, connect with archetypes, and mark patterns that appear in your readings.

oneCard.name: One Card
oneCard.description: Single-card focus for quick insight into the present moment.

threeCard.name: Three Cards
threeCard.description: Classic three-card spread exploring past, present, and future influences.

celticCross.name: Celtic Cross
celticCross.description: Iconic ten-card layout for deep, multi-layered guidance.

love.name: Love & Connection
love.description: Seven-card journey through relationship dynamics and emotional bonds.

horseshoe.name: Horseshoe
horseshoe.description: Seven cards revealing hidden influences, guidance, and outcomes.

weekly.name: Week Ahead
weekly.description: Seven positions to illuminate energy for each day of the week.

yearWheel.name: Year Wheel
yearWheel.description: Twelve-card ring highlighting themes for each month and the year overall.

position.focus.description: Central theme calling for attention right now.
position.past.description: Roots and experiences that shaped the present.

celtic.present.description: Core of the matter right now.
celtic.conscious.description: What you aspire to or are aware of.
celtic.advice.description: Guidance for navigating the path ahead.
celtic.outcome.description: Probable result if energy stays aligned.

horseshoe.past.description: Influences that follow you into the present.
horseshoe.hidden.description: Unseen forces or secrets at play.

weekly.name: Week Ahead
weekly.description: Track the tone for each day and align intentions.

year.name: Year Wheel
year.description: Reflect on twelve months of growth and turning points.

interpretation.summaryIntro: Your {spread} reading reveals guidance across {count} positions.
interpretation.summaryClosing: Reflect on the messages, note synchronicities, and act with intention.
interpretation.notesPlaceholder: Write your reflections, emotions, or rituals...

history.emptySubtitle: Complete a spread to build your tarot journal.
history.deleteDescription: Remove this reading from your history?
history.clearDescription: Erase all saved readings? This action cannot be undone.
